Text.Page:
Mission Orders

We can't let the Atel Akaad and their allies tighten their hold on Amena Quatla.

Take out {@LinkCreature:57#1#sikandari stalwarts}, {@LinkCreature:57#5#geilrik hellhounds}, Lokian {@LinkCreature:57#13#bloodchargers}, {@LinkCreature:57#16#bloogmaguses}, {@LinkCreature:57#26#bloodspillers}, and {@LinkCreature:57#21#bloodshapers}, and {@LinkCreature:57#23#eldritch vanquishers}.

Report to Emya in Dragonfall when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
